newsitem.title: USA: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Corporate Earnings.
newsitem.headline: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Corporate Earnings.

text.p: The following companies reported corporate earnings on Tuesday:
The company reported its third quarter earnings per share were $0.11 versus $0.11 a year before.
* Digital Equuipment Corp was off 4-7/8 to 29-1/2.

The company reported a first-quarter loss of $0.48 a share versus a profit of $0.26 for the same period a year ago. The consensus estimate had been for a loss of $0.14 a share. ----------------------------------------------------------------
* Oak Industries Inc was off 3-1/8 to 29-7/8.
The company reported third-quarter earnings per share of $0.41 versus $0.30, both excluding items. ----------------------------------------------------------------

The company reported third-quarter earnings per share of $0.88 versus $2.36 for the same period a year before. The First Call estimate had been for earnings of $1.19 a share. ----------------------------------------------------------------
The company reported a third-quarter pro forma loss of $0.51 a share versus a loss of $0.05 for the same period a year before.

After the market's close on Monday the company reported a third-quarter earnings per share loss of $2.98 against a profit of $0.38 for the same period a year before. ----------------------------------------------------------------
Fruit of the Loom Inc was up 1-7/8 to 33-1/4.
The company reported third-quarter earnings per share of $0.63 vs $0.32. The First Call estimate had been for earnings of $0.57 a share.
